titleStmt.title: The collegiat suffrage of the divines of Great Britaine, concerning the five articles controverted in the Low Countries VVhich suffrage was by them delivered in the synod of Dort, March 6. anno 1619. Being their vote or voice foregoing the joint and publique judgment of that Synod.
Suffragium collegiale theologorum Magnae Britanniae de quinque controversis remonstrantium articulis. English.
titleStmt.author: Carleton, George, 1559-1628.
Synod of Dort (1618-1619)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Miles Flesher] for Robert Milbourne, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the Greyhound,

notesStmt.note: Signed: George Carleton .. Iohn Davenant .. Samuel Ward .. Thomas Goad .. Walter Balcanquall ..
A translation of: Suffragium collegiale theologorum Magnae Britanniae de quinque controversis remonstrantium articulis.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the Greyhound
